name: Authorization feedback
description:
This feature allow to receive authorization feedback from cashing and send event like `PaymentSchedulePaymentValidated` to say tempo-composer that payment is OK.

  Case not managed now:
  - partial payment (a product paid on multiple schedule) example 50% on command 50% on delivery
  - an authorization with only some products of a schedule rank
